abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Institutional
            Reform and Capacity Building Project for Sierra Leone is to
            establish a functioning local government system and
            improving the inclusiveness, transparency, and
            accountability of public financial management at all levels
            of government. The Bank team considers the reallocation: (i)
            as a project change within the meaning of (project
            supervision); (ii) does not involve the use of cost of
            project savings, specifically as per footnote 3 to OP 13.25;
            and (iii) does not involve any new change to the original
            project description. Further, the team considers the
            reallocation to be a minor one within the meaning of OP/PB
            13.05. Finally, the reallocation will not result in
            significant changes to the project's description,
            objectives, or associated outcome targets.
